TopicTitle: Going live in 5, 4, 3... [Twitch] - Designing a Stock Nasa Shuttle

Articles.Content:
In my most recent blog post, I attempt a Nasa Like shutle design. (Although, I'm not particularly impressed with P2 at the moment)

I had, what I thought, was a working fuel line for my up and coming Space Shuttle Main Engine Test (SSMET). I had also hoped for a more relaxing night on design instead of working with quirks and quarks and whatever else may come my way.

I managed to set up a Twitch account, full 1080p, (I hope) and it just streams me fiddling around with my SSMET mission. Those Kerb Damned pipes just won't stay in place! I made a mess of things on my last save, so it could be an interesting night of experimentation with fuel lines.

If successful, and that's a big IF, then I will be conducting further Approach and Landing Tests (ALT) with the Engine assembly, cutting the engines and hoping to Kerb that this thing glides.

That in itself will take hours, however, If I manage to get through that, I'm going to redesign the P2 to the much prefered P1 aesthetic. (see imgur link in blog)

All this is happening LIVE, right now!

I don't do commentary, sorry. However, I do play music, so be prepared to mute the volume, or crank it up.

If you're interested in watching me fail, over and over again then come give a watch, if you're bored, or whatever.

http://www.twitch.tv/phenomanonx

High in quality, high in boredom, AWESOME tunes, and some kerb'd up designs.

Come on by!

Cheers

(I play full screen and won't respond to chat right away, jsyn)

http://www.twitch.tv/phenomanonx
